title: Flutter Course for Beginners
summary: A 37-hour comprehensive course on Flutter and Dart. Build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile (iOS & Android) from a single codebase.
prerequisites: Some programming experience is helpful but not required.

title: React Native Tutorial for Beginners
summary: Learn the basics of React Native and build your first iOS and Android apps. You'll learn about components, state, props, and styling.
